Package org.codehaus.mojo.cassandra

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCassandraMojo
    Base class for all the Cassandra Maven Plugin goals.
    AbstractCqlExecMojo
    Abstract parent class for mojos that need to run CQL statements.
    AbstractCqlLoadMojo
    Abstract parent class for mojos that load and execute CQL statements from a file.
    AbstractSchemaCassandraMojo
    Some general operations and contract for Mojo implementations that will interact with the system_* API methods.
    CassandraMonitor
    A Monitor for controlling the Cassandra process.
    CleanupCassandraMojo
    Runs nodetool cleanup on a Cassandra instance.
    CompactCassandraMojo
    Runs nodetool compact on a Cassandra instance.
    ConsoleScanner
    Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
    CqlExecCassandraMojo
    Executes cql statements from maven.
    DeleteCassandraMojo
    Deletes the Cassandra home directory that we create for running Cassandra.
    DropColumnFamiliesMojo
    Drop the specified ColumnFamilies or, if no arguments are given, the specified Keyspace
    FlushCassandraMojo
    Runs nodetool flush on a Cassandra instance.
    HelpMojo
    Display help information on cassandra-maven-plugin.
    Call mvn cassandra:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.
    LoadCassandraMojo
    Loads a Cassandra CQL script into a Cassandra instance.
    LoadCassandraUnitDataSetMojo
    Loads a CassandraUnit DataSet into a Cassandra instance.
    RepairCassandraMojo
    Runs nodetool repair on a Cassandra instance.
    RunCassandraMojo
    Runs Cassandra in the foreground.
    StartCassandraClusterMojo
    Starts a Cassandra instance in the background.
    StartCassandraMojo
    Starts a Cassandra instance in the background.
    StopCassandraClusterMojo
    Stops a background Cassandra instance.
    StopCassandraMojo
    Stops a background Cassandra instance.
    ThriftApiOperation  
    TruncateCassandraMojo
    Executes the truncate command against the specified keyspace.
    Utils
    Utility classes for interacting with Cassandra.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ThriftApiExecutionException
    Exception to wrap the various Exceptions that can come back from Apache Cassandra's Trift API
